text: Juan Ignacio Silva (born 9 September 1997) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Club Atlético Villa San Carlos. ==Career== Silva began with Argentine Primera División side Gimnasia y Esgrima. He was twice an unused substitute during 2015 in games against Estudiantes and Huracán, prior to making his professional debut on 11 May 2015 in a goalless draw against Sarmiento.
